lead_paragraph: An analysis suggests the city could run out of money as early as April if the New Jersey Legislature does not approve two bills being considered.

headline.print_headline: Default Is Near for Atlantic City
headline.main: Atlantic City Could Default in Weeks, Ratings Agency Says

snippet: An analysis suggests the city could run out of money as early as April if the New Jersey Legislature does not approve two bills being considered.
abstract: Moody's Investors Services warns Atlantic City will likely face default and bankruptcy as early as April unless New Jersey takes drastic action.
